questions.question: Who was Philip II?

choices.answer: King of Macedonia and father of Alexander
King of Macedonia and great-grandfather of Alexander

questions.question: What did the Greeks think of the Macedonians?

choices.answer: They looked down on them, thought they were uncivilized.
They saw them as equal to the Greeks.

questions.question: Alexander kept a copy of the ____ under his pillow because he idolized the heroism of Achilles.
Who was the king who fled Alexander's army, eventually giving way to the conquest of Persia?

questions.question: After fighting for 11 years and marching over 11,000 miles, what did Alexander's army do?

choices.answer: They kept going until they reached the Mauryan Empire.
They continued to conquer until Alexander's 50th birthday.
They turned back and headed home.

questions.question: What happened to Alexander?

choices.answer: He died in battle at the age of 45.
He died of a fever at the age of 32.
He lived a long time and continued his conquest of Asia.
He was murdered at the age of 37.

imageMetadata.resources: Image credit: By Walter Crane (Own work) https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:With_an_effort_he_looked_at_them_as_they_passed.jpg  [Public domain, mark 1.0], via Wikimedia Commons, {{PD-1923}}

questions.resources: Image credit: By Walter Crane (Own work) https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:With_an_effort_he_looked_at_them_as_they_passed.jpg  [Public domain, mark 1.0], via Wikimedia Commons, {{PD-1923}}

choices.answer: His conquests had an impact on culture throughout the land.
He left behind nothing of significance.
His people forced everyone to adopt Macedonian culture.
